title: The Scribe
description: The remnants of their minds haunt him.Sasha won’t survive if he has to erase any more souls. He needs a jacker Clan that won't force him to use his unique and horrible skill. When a slick revolutionary Clan leader offers him a chance to serve a higher purpose, Sasha's wary there’s a catch. But when a beautiful female jacker is hunted by the kind of brutal Clan leader Sasha knows all too well, he has to decide if there is any cause worth the price of using his ability one more time.The Scribe is Sasha’s origin story.MINDJACK: KIRAOpen Minds (Mindjack: Kira Book One)Closed Hearts (Mindjack: Kira Book Two)Free Souls (Mindjack: Kira Book Three)MINDJACK: ZEPHLocked Tight (Mindjack: Zeph Book One)Cracked Open (Mindjack: Zeph Book Two)Broken Wide (Mindjack: Zeph Book Three)
author: Susan Kaye Quinn
